XsltprocÂ¶

Boost.cmake does a standard path search for xsltproc. If found, it sets the following variables

XSLTPROC_FOUND Was xsltproc found
XSLTPROC_FLAGS “–xinclude”
XSLTPROC_EXECUTABLE path to the executable
